text: The BYD M6 is a Minivan made by BYD from 2010 to 2017. == History and Features == The BYD M6 was launched at the Beijing Auto Show in 2010. its the first ever minivan from BYD the M6 has a very similar design to the Toyota Previa/Estima it has seven seats and is equipped with a 2.0 liter and 2.4 liter petrol engines with a 5-speed manual transmission and a 4 and 6-speed automatic transmissions the minivan received minor improvements in 2013. == Markets == The BYD M6 was sold mainly in the Chinese market during its production run. == Discontinuation == The production of The BYD M6 ended in 2017 and was eventually replaced by the BYD Song Max. == References == M6 Category:2010s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: BYD M6 (2010)
